It works just fine at me. Thanks for the upload!
Thumbs up for our Hungarian designing team Black Hole, but this terrible city view has not been solved yet. Hopefully it will be.
being able to tilt the screen with right-click is mysteriously absent, using delete/page down is a shitty game interface.

yeah, its different from beta verion - only tutorial but  +1 skirmish/multiplayer map

Mart726 - The demo came out the day it was uploaded and the demo was the same size as this file. 

The top comment also says that this is the demo.


I think it's safe to say that it's the demo.

if you compare versions it might help, this download is ver 1.0.31232, I don't have the "old" beta to compare it to, but it seemed to me that this was apx .5 gigs larger than the older upload.  and frankly, why worry if it's been called a demo or a beta.  to my knowledge there is no public demo.  therefore, this is the beta.
